name: Stuffed Pepper Mac & Cheese
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot set over high heat, boil macaroni until tender, about 6–8 min.
Meanwhile, place beef in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high, 6 min. Once beef is cooked, break it up using Ground Meat Separator.
For stuffed whole peppers, cut tops from peppers and gently remove pith and seeds.
Drain pasta; return to pot. Add milk, seasoning, and butter, if using. Add beef. Stir until evenly mixed.
Using a large spoon, stuff peppers with mac & cheese mixture. Place in Multipurpose Steamer and top with grated cheese.
Cover; microwave on high until bell peppers have softened and cheese is melted, 5 min.
tips: Go vegetarian—replace ground beef with soy ground round or lentils.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Mac & Cheese Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Creamy & comforting, made with real cheddar cheese, no artificial colors or flavors.
